name: How can I randomize parts of a questionnaire that consist of non-randomized pages?
title: How can I randomize parts of a questionnaire that consist of non-randomized pages?
body:
Overview

This article explains how to randomize specific parts of a questionnaire that consist of non-randomized pages using the Random Order feature and filters.

 

Information

  • Create a Random Order "page" (in the "Dynamics" options under Questionnaire Editor)

  • Create a filter for each block you want to randomize (example: you have two parts, you create two filters) that depends directly on the Random Order page

  • Make the questions depend on the filters you need

The Random Order behavior only affects the first child, so both filters will rotate, but every page within the filters will be displayed in the right order.

 

FAQ

How does the Random Order behavior affect the questionnaire?

The Random Order behavior only affects the first child, meaning that the filters you created will rotate. However, every page within the filters will be displayed in the correct order.
